Who: SCORPONOK, Hydras, Tuscon Prime
Location: Black Fortress - The PIT

(OOC: Sorry, I though Hydras was alone originally. Since most folks
are engaged elsewhere I stuck Scorponok in there to make it all work)

BIC:

> "WE have a arrived"said Hydras devilish while he stopped and discovered
> tucson's eyes"It's time for you to take posession of your new room...
> SHANCKLE HIM!!!"

Scorponok nodded as he stepped froward as he attempted to roughly
shove Tuscon into the confined cell just as hard as he could, and then
shackled him, pulling them hard! There was very little movement for
Tuscon, although he could probably find a few micrometers if he tried.

"This is treated Cybertronian metal, you might find this a little more
difficult to break." Scorponok said as he stepped back to admire his
handy work. He with a single movement he pulled one of the manacle
locks a little harder, as if to make sure that there would be no
escape for Tuscon.

"Difficult, yes impossible." Scorponok folded his arms over his chest
as he looked back at Hydras for his orders.

(TAG)

Preston
